text: Lyudvig Alekseyevich Chibirov (Cybyrty Aleksejy fyrt Ljudvig, , ; born November 19, 1932) is a Ossetian politician. He was born in Tskhinvali. He was the first elected-President of South Ossetia serving from 1993 through 2001. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of South Ossetia Category:Politicians from Georgia (country)
title: Lyudvig Chibirov
